data.speaker: Player
data.content: Hmmmm,I guess I found the cause of that noise, it seems something opened the locker....

data.speaker: Player
data.content: So much blood inside it, and there are bloody footprints on the floor.

data.speaker: Player
data.content: Something was hidden in this and went out just now.

data.speaker: Player
data.content: Those footprints lead to the stairs, what the hell could that be...

data.speaker: Player
data.content: Ok, I can't stop right now. Move!
